cause.description:
express yourself in any way- a song, poem, sculpture, building plane models, designing clothes, basically anything to let out pent up energy. internal peace and tranquility is the first step to understanding others.
1. self-expression leads to internal peace
2. meditation and a tranquil mindset allow understanding.
3. understanding is an essential building block to peaceful living
cause.mission: strive for peace by using your own talents
cause.name: express for peace
